title: Behavioral psychologist most likely to study

content.question: Of the following, a behavioral psychologist is most likely to study the

choices.label: perceived locus of control of adults who experience panic attacks
formation of emotional attachments to significant others
defense mechanisms used by depressed adults and children in stressful situations
effects of token economies on establishing social skills among children with emotional disturbances

content.answer: effects of token economies on establishing social skills among children with emotional disturbances

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
